name: run & run & run
description:
Hi guys, that's my first project in game development so it is just a little try and I made only 3 levels. The game's main goal is to escape from the red square for as long as you can. I'll like it if someone can give me some advice to improve as a game dev. At the moment I am using Godot engine.

The tileset used in my game is that:

https://genewheel.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
